title: Why is Riot Support impossible to use?
body:
Why does riot even have a support page, when they're limited options for support 
You click on 'here' when in the security section to submit a ticket about how to get unbanned 
And riot redirects you to a drop down menu with no options for security. If you chose the recovering my account option which is the closest option, riot sends you an automated email which basically just tells you to reset your password because your ticket is listed under that category. They address no detail in an email or even reply to the contents of your email

replies.body:
I'm not too sure what you mean by "how to get unbanned"?

+ If your account has been suspended for a chargeback, then you need to use this category:
 **_[Has your account been suspended for a chargeback?]_**


+ If your account has been blocked/disabled due to security concerns (a hacker trying to get in), then you need to use this category:
 _** [I need help recovering my account.]**_

+ If you have received a ban for behaviour or using scripts, and want to argue against it, then you need to use this catergory:
 _**[I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games.] > [Game and Features] > [General Questions]**_

Let me know if you're still having trouble :)

*long message, please read* 

My account was suspended for 2 months (code 2100) which apparently means the accounts security is compromised and is under investigation according to a LoL forum on this site (i believe). Now i've had trouble in the past with somone hacking my account and playing on it while i took a break from LoL. My issue more settles around the ticket system 
During the first time i was hacked i was prompted by an automated blizcrank bot email to simply change my password. This time, my microsoft was hacked 1 hour before ( recieved an email from microsoft ) my league was banned. 
Both tickets have been under "recovering my account", in both tickets i've provided information on my account to 'assist' them 
And also sent photos in attempts that a support member will use the information and photos of the email microsoft sent me to prove that the account is in fact mine. After all this both messages were replied with an automated "change your password" blitzcrank bot email 
Meaning all said information, detail must have just been ignored and the support system has sent me this message all because it's listed under 'recovering my account' 
I have so much proof that could help if my account is under investigation 
Eg photos, bank charges which corollate with the account
Just spent $32 on elementalist Lux and cant play it all because some low life has hacked me and possibly made my account unusable!

They can always track down the IP Address and if those games happen to be under your IP Address despite "you being on a hiatus" it could possibly mean you were lying and trying to avoid being banned by putting the blame on the other person.

I'm not saying that it was you, but I have my doubts. My friend who did indeed got hacked got his account back easily with no dispute, they immediately tracked down the games and it wasn't to his IP Address and they solved the issue. They allowed him to reset his password, and change his email.

Microsoft provided me with the IP address an details of person who hacked my microsoft right before my league was banned 
Both my microsoft and LoL passwords were changed too by the way! 
Why go to the efforts and extents i have if i am responsible? 
It's a damn bronze 5 account aha! 
Only vaulable to me! 

how did he do that? But just submitting a ticket? Was he replied to by an actual employee or just received and automessage?
He submitted a ticket and talked with an actual employee, I don't think at any point he talked to an auto message or a bot.

What were the ticket ID numbers for ALL the tickets where you got an automated blitzcrank bot email?

(Ticket ID's can be found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests ) )

24597467
24654147 (unrecoverable account) latest one as all the others were replied with blitz bot
24596733
23470859 ( original time i was hacked in September )

Guys, i was unbanned! It must have been wrong about them taking in my information! 
Thank you both for the help 
I didnt receive an email though, i just tried to log in after reading your comment Pluie

Ahah good to hear man ^_^

 Just really make sure you **reset your password** though, for BOTH League of Legends and your microsoft email. This time you were lucky and Riot managed to detect it for you, but I've seen many cases where people loose their accounts forever.
